716453f.folder: Barclay Street & West Broadway, Manhattan, NY

724359f.text:
12 Wost Broadway, adjoining tho S. W. corner of Barclay Stroet. This structdre projects thru this block to front on Groenwich Stroot,
whero it boars No. 227.
July 29, 1914
Wurts Brothars

724358f-a.text:
West Broadway, west side, south from and including Barclay, to Vesey Streets. Also shown is Barclay Street, south side, west from West Broadway, to and including Greenwich Street. The Barclay Street Station of the
Ninth Ave., Elevated, is shown on Greenwich Street.
June 5, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
724358f-a.folder: West Broadway & Barclay Street, Manhattan, NY

724357f-b.text:
(1)
An aerial view of West Broadway, north from and including Barclay Street. Also shown is Barclay Street, at West Broadway.
April 3, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a different angle.
April 3, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
